name: Freestlye Dancers!
description:
A DDR Typed Rhythm game about Freestyle Dancing!

----Controls----

The controls are completely editable!
WASD - Non-Edited buttons

----Credits----

CryingPsycho (Musician)
Jasp (Programmer, Artist)

----Community----
We want to thank you guys for helping, and motivating us while developing the game! We really hope that you guys will enjoy this Early-Beta version of the game!
